alert.note: Alert for Northern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 3:33AM PST until December 29 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Winter Weather to Impact Mountain and Foothill Travel into Wednesday... .Mostly light snow will spread over Northern California today with some snow possibly occurring on the Valley floor in the Northern Sacramento Valley. Another round of moderate to heavy snow is expected tonight and Wednesday with continued low snow levels, again possibly down to the Valley floor in the Northern Sacramento Valley. Check road conditions before traveling. Some roads may remain closed or impassable. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow, or a mix of rain and snow is expected at times on the Valley floor. Minor accumulations are possible on grassy areas. However, a couple of inches of snow may accumulate over the higher terrain surrounding the Valley floor. * WHERE...Northern Sacramento Valley. * WHEN...Until noon Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
